s0101: Passing through Luoyang, issued an edict saying: 'The Three Dynasties are far distant, difficult to preserve.
s0102: Enfeoff thirty li of land to the Zhou descendants as Zhou Zi Nan Jun, to maintain the former kings' sacrifices.'
s0103: This year, the Son of Heaven began touring the commanderies and counties, approaching Mount Tai.
s0104: That spring, Marquis Yuecheng submitted a memorial speaking of Luan Da.
s0105: Luan Da was a Jiaodong palace attendant, formerly studied with the General of Literary Accomplishment, then became Jiaodong King's Director of Workshops.
s0106: And Marquis Yuecheng's elder sister was Queen Kang, without sons.
s0107: King Kang died, another consort's son was established as king.
s0108: But Queen Kang had lewd conduct, did not get along with the king, threatened each other with law.
s0109: Queen Kang heard the General of Literary Accomplishment had died, wished to curry favor with the emperor, sent Luan Da through Marquis Yuecheng to seek audience and speak of magic.
s0110: The Son of Heaven had already executed the General of Literary Accomplishment, afterward regretted his early death, grieved that his methods were not exhausted, when he saw Luan Da, greatly pleased.
s0111: Da was tall and handsome, spoke of many strategies, dared to make grand claims, handled matters without doubt.
s0112: The emperor gave him ten thousand catties of gold to make the Great Altar of Heaven.
s0113: Da said: 'I have heard Huangdi did not die, became an immortal, rode a dragon ascended to heaven.
s0114: I wish to refine gold to make vessels for eating and drinking, then immortals will come.'
s0115: The emperor gave him more gold, but Da's magic failed, the gold could not be refined.
s0117: That year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0118: Second year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0119: Third year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0120: Fourth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0121: Fifth year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0122: Sixth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0123: Seventh year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0124: Eighth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0125: Ninth year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0126: Tenth year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0127: Eleventh year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0128: Twelfth year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0129: Thirteenth year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0130: Fourteenth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0131: Fifteenth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0132: Sixteenth year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0133: Seventeenth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0134: Eighteenth year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0135: Nineteenth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0136: Twentieth year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0137: Twenty-first year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0138: Twenty-second year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0139: Twenty-third year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0140: Twenty-fourth year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0141: Twenty-fifth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0142: Twenty-sixth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0143: Twenty-seventh year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0144: Twenty-eighth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0145: Twenty-ninth year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0146: Thirtieth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0147: Thirty-first year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0148: Thirty-second year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0149: Thirty-third year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0150: Thirty-fourth year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
